overview: Monsters attacked the Grid, home of the Stikbots, while it was being rebuilt. After Striker was captured, Pixel, Shift, and their monster guide Gnots, enter the Nightmare Realm to rescue him. The three embark on a journey, traversing perilous lands and facing frightening foes leading to a confrontation with the domain’s lord and the reason for Striker’s abduction.
title: Off The Grid: Nightmare
